extraction_metadata.notes: Complete trial record with detailed witness testimony, torture sessions, confession/retraction cycle, and final approval for execution. Accused came from family with history of witchcraft accusations (mother and aunt). Economic disputes (debts, inheritance, short-measure cloth) feature prominently. Accused showed sympathy for poor and claimed lower status at sabbat. George Bergier death appears in multiple testimonies.
